title: Watch Bruno Mars' Epic 2017 Grammy Awards Performance
text: Watch Bruno Mars' Epic 2017 Grammy Awards Performance That's what we like. Share via Twitter Kevin Winter/Getty Images Bruno Mars lived up to his own lyrics at the 2017 Grammy Awards : "If you say you want a good time, well, here I am baby." Bruno Mars' performance of "That's What I Like" was a good time for the audience, viewers, and Twitter alike. The superstar performer took the stage in an '80s-era leather track suit and, surprisingly, left a lot of his trademark theatrics (wild dance moves, crazy costume changes, pyrotechnics, and the like) at home. In its place was Mars' smooth-as-silk voice wooing us with his buttery, swoon-worthy lyrics and some catchy choreography. Of course, Mars knows his way around a Grammys stage; not only has he performed at the show before, he's also the proud owner of four Grammys of his own. And as always, Mars' 2017 performance packed a big, soulful punch, much to the delight of the at-home viewers and celebs watching him crush it live. Catch a glimpse below: Even Jennifer Lopez was feeling it. And Rihanna.
